name: Alien Planet (itch)
description:
Alien Planet is a challenging top down Shooter Game.

This game is the story about a man who accidentally teleport into another universe where all the planets are organisms and he falls into a prey of one of these planets and must find a way to destroy this planet because it has disabled player's warper. This game also got a funny ending.

Note - If the game gives error/crashes just press F9 at the start of the game to disable the use of shaders.

This game was created for October Challenge - Ludum Dare in which I have to earn 1$ so any help will really be appreciated.
